message.name: ERR_FV_RISK_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The risk reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PRIORITY_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The priority reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLEXITY_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The complexity reason must be entered.

message.locale: The risk classification must be entered.

message.locale: The complexity classification must be entered.

message.locale: The priority classification must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PRIORITY_REASON_EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
message.locale: Priority reason entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLEXITY_REASON_EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
message.locale: Complexity reason entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_RISK_REASON_EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
message.locale: Risk reason entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.
